Medicare Fee-For-Service Public Provider Enrollment API Medicare Opt Out Affidavits API Medicare Order and Referring API Medicare Physician & Other Practitioners APIs Medicare Revalidation Due Date API Medicare Revalidation Clinic Group Practice Reassignment API Medicare Provider and Supplier Taxonomy Crosswalk API NPPES NPI Public Registry API

provider

The goal of provider is to provide performant and reliable open-source tools to facilitate easy access to healthcare provider data through publicly available APIs & sources.


Function API
nppes_npi() NPPES National Provider Identifier (NPI) Registry
provider_enrollment() Medicare Fee-For-Service Public Provider Enrollment
beneficiary_enrollment() Medicare Monthly Enrollment
order_refer() Medicare Order and Referring
opt_out() Medicare Opt Out Affidavits
physician_by_provider() Medicare Physician & Other Practitioners: by Provider
physician_by_service() Medicare Physician & Other Practitioners: by Provider and Service
physician_by_geography() Medicare Physician & Other Practitioners: by Geography and Service
revalidation_date() Medicare Revalidation Due Date
revalidation_group() Medicare Revalidation Clinic Group Practice Reassignment
cc_specific() Medicare Specific Chronic Conditions
cc_multiple() Medicare Multiple Chronic Conditions
clia_labs() Medicare Provider of Services File - Clinical Laboratories
taxonomy_crosswalk() Medicare Provider and Supplier Taxonomy Crosswalk
missing_information() CMS Public Reporting of Missing Digital Contact Information


Installation

You can install the development version of provider from GitHub with:

# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("andrewallenbruce/provider")

# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("andrewallenbruce/provider")


NPPES National Provider Identifier (NPI) Registry 


# Load library
library(provider)

ex <- nppes_npi(npi = 1083879860)
#> Error in nppes_npi(npi = 1083879860): could not find function "nppes_npi"
#> Error in tidyr::unnest(ex, cols = c(basic, addresses, taxonomies, endpoints), : object 'ex' not found


Medicare Fee-For-Service Public Provider Enrollment API 


exa <- provider_mppe(npi = ex$number)
#> Error in provider_mppe(npi = ex$number): object 'ex' not found
#> Error in tidyr::pivot_longer(exa, cols = dplyr::everything(), names_to = "name", : object 'exa' not found

Medicare Monthly Enrollment 

month_ex <- monthly_enroll(year      = 2018, 
                           month     = "Year", 
                           geo_lvl   = "County", 
                           state_abb = "AL", 
                           county    = "Autauga")
year year_2 month bene_geo_lvl bene_state_abrvtn bene_state_desc bene_county_desc

Code of Conduct

Please note that the provider project is released with a Contributor Code of Conduct. By contributing to this project, you agree to abide by its terms.
